amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to deny security clearance to civillian employees of the Department of Defense due to a "furlough caused by sequestration".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 67 printed in House Report 113-170 to protect DoD civilians' security clearances.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A059) Agreed to by recorded vote: 277 - 142 (Roll no. 407).
